name: Hambre
description:
Help Hambre try to stay healthy by directing him to eat healthy foods like apples, blueberries, oranges, and tomatoes. Whenever he sees a cupcake though, he will gulp it down in one bite. You'll need to manage Hambre's health while aiming for a high score.  If Hambre's health falls to 0, it's Game Over.

If you get to 100% Healthy, you will activate "Cheat Day" where Hambre will eat anything and everything in one bite to quickly rack up points, including eating cupcakes with no penalty.

The game was built for GMTK Jam 2020 around the theme "Out of Control". Learned a lot during this experience, it's my first time participating in a jam but had a lot of fun.

Notes:
  • No audio, ran out of time :(
  • Game is a choppy, first time exporting to HTML, need to read up on Godot's export settings
